Paul Bernard (actor) https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Paul_Bernard_(actor) 0 Paul Bernard (21 December 1898 – 4 May 1958) was a French actor. He appeared in thirty five films including A Friend Will Come Tonight (1946). Paul_Bernard ( 21 December_1898 – 4_May_1958 ) was a_French_actor . He appeared in thirty_five_films including A_Friend Will_Come Tonight_(_1946_) .
